summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Eighteenth Avenue South, Nineteenth Avenue South, and Twentieth Avenue South, each from Spokane Street to Stevens Street, all in The City of Seattle, by constructing sewers therein of the proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary wyes, openings, manholes, flush tanks, catch basins and their appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, all in accordance with Resolution No. 4346 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
